import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import 'boxicons' const Alarm = () => { const [currentTime, setCurrentTime] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { setInterval(displayTimer, 1000) }, [currentTime]) const displayTimer = () => { const date = new Date(); const currentTime = date.toLocaleTimeString("en-US", { hour12: false }); return currentTime } return (
{currentTime}
00:00
00:00
00:00
); }; export default Alarm;
